attributes.action: Stop the New extended Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ)
attributes.additional_details:
It's another way for TfL and the London Mayor to extract more money from all people living & working in London .
Especially now that Covid-19 has hit many families with such hardship around London, England and around the world.
attributes.background: Abolish the new extended Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ),as it's unjust for all the people who use the Outer London (A) Roads

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the London Assembly and the London Mayor.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
